title: StatusQ: Create generic proxy model `GroupByModel`

milestone.title: 0.15.5 - Stabilizing release
milestone.description:
A point milestone where we focus 100% on bug fixing, stabilisation, reliability and finishing any unfinished items from 0.15  

**1.  Reduce size of community description metadata**
- better compressions, less duplication

**2. Use data sync layer (or other mechanism) to improve community description reliability**
- Every time a new user joins the community, the Control Node updates and signs the description.
- Random back off to stop it being too chatty 

**3. Refactor synchronisation of contacts**
- To fix various contact request issues, is a large work item
- Mishka and Igor to work on this?
- https://github.com/status-im/status-go/issues/3720
- https://github.com/status-im/status-go/issues/3803#issuecomment-1654588500

--- Wallet ---

- Database re-encryption flows
- Community Asset and NFT designs for Asset screens
- Community token visibility
- Minor updates to Asset screens
- WalletConnect
